basic.floral_language:
Aster novi-belgii 
Floriography: elegant, plain, pure
Aster novi-belgiiis very beautiful. Under sunlight, like dazzling little stars in clusters or clumps.Aster novi-belgii resist cold weather, even frost, therefore loved by the public in the fall season, and are often well loved by the ancient literati. 
Aster novi-belgii like sunny days, mainly blossom in September-November for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period August-October, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color blue purple or rose red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: After flowering remove the withered flowers, the part on the ground will wither in winter, the plant germinates again in spring
